title: Cant open the store
body: I cant open the store.  Blackout appeared

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing an issue we became aware of earlier today. We're looking into what might be causing this, and you can keep updated on our progress in our post [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load).
